definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: Then sink to your nose in a bubble bath?
sentences.chinese: 當你洗泡泡浴時泡沫會弄到鼻尖上嗎？

sentences.english: It also makes a great bubble bath liquid!
sentences.chinese: 他還可以當作泡泡浴來用。

sentences.english: Think about a cinnamon-scented candle or some chocolate bubble bath.
sentences.chinese: 考慮下肉桂香的蠟燭或者巧克力泡泡浴。

sentences.english: I use this product as shampoo, body wash, bubble bath.
sentences.chinese: 我把這個產品作爲洗髮水，沐浴露，泡泡浴使用。

sentences.english: A warm bubble bath can help to lower a temperature and ease muscle aches.
sentences.chinese: 溫暖的泡泡浴能夠幫助寶寶降溫及緩解肌肉痠痛。

sentences.english: So I grew my hair out. I took bubble baths.
sentences.chinese: 所以我開始蓄頭髮，洗泡泡浴。

sentences.english: For a bubble bath, pour small amount under running water. Rinse clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果想給寶寶洗泡泡浴，倒少量到水中攪動即可。

definition: to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
taking a bath together as a couple
shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
